title: Chelsea seal Disasi deal
title_page: Chelsea seal Disasi deal - BBC Sport
maintext:
Chelsea have completed the signing of France centre-back Axel Disasi from Monaco.
The 25-year-old has agreed a six-year deal at Stamford Bridge.
Disasi has made 130 appearances in Ligue 1 and has been capped four times by his country. He was part of the French squad for last yearâ€™s World Cup in Qatar.
